wikipedia_page.main:
Benjamin Keith Davies (born 11 August 1995) is an English professional footballer who plays as a centre-back or left-back for Championship club Sheffield United, on loan from Liverpool. 
Davies spent most of his early career with Preston North End, and had loan spells with York City, Tranmere Rovers, Southport, Newport County and Fleetwood Town.

response: *Ben Davies – Liverpool
